mapper.select: SELECT r.review_no AS reviewNo, r.review_title AS reviewTitle, c.customer_id AS customerId, r.createdate, r.updatedate FROM review r JOIN customer c ON r.customer_no = c.customer_no ORDER BY r.review_no DESC LIMIT #{beginRow}, #{rowPerPage};

SELECT prr.program_reservation_no AS programRsNo, CONCAT(pr.program_name,' / 참여일자: ',prd.program_date) AS programName
FROM program_reservation prr LEFT JOIN program_date prd ON prr.program_date_no = prd.program_date_no LEFT JOIN program pr ON prd.program_no = pr.program_no WHERE prr.payment_no = (SELECT pay.payment_no FROM payment pay WHERE pay.customer_no = #{customerNo} AND pay.active = 'Y')

SELECT r.review_no AS reviewNo, c.customer_id AS customerId, c.customer_no AS customerNo, r.review_title AS reviewTitle, COALESCE(ri.review_img_origin, 'NoImage') AS reviewImgOrigin, r.review_content AS reviewContent, r.createdate AS createdate, r.updatedate AS updatedate FROM review r JOIN customer c ON r.customer_no = c.customer_no LEFT JOIN review_img ri ON ri.review_no = r.review_no WHERE r.review_no = #{reviewNo};
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO review ( customer_no, program_reservation_no, review_title, review_content, createdate, updatedate ) VALUES ( #{customerNo}, #{programRsNo}, #{reviewTitle}, #{reviewContent}, NOW(), NOW() )
